entry.title: WINTER STORM WATCH, Savant Lake
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 6:10 p.m. EDT Sunday 2 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Snow. Low minus 12.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 early this evening. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Sunday 2 April 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 6. POP 40%
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending in the morning then mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 20 in the morning and minus 13 in the afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Sunday 2 April 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 17. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming light late in the evening. Low minus 17. Wind chill minus 12 in the evening and minus 26 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Sunday 2 April 2023
